full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Ice Blocks for Winterlude

### Notice Details:
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4063751565
- **Solicitation Title (English):** Ice Blocks for Winterlude
- **Solicitation Title (French):** Blocs de glace pour bal de neige
- **Title Reference:** WS4063751565
- **Notice Date:** 2023-09-29
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-09T14:00:00
- **Modification Date:** 2023-11-01
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-31
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2028-03-30

### Tender Overview
The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) is requiring the purchase of Ice Blocks for Winterlude. The delivery location is situated in Ottawa/Gatineau. The contractor is responsible for the delivery.

### Tender Details
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
- **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
- **Trade Agreements:** Trade Agreements include Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and others.
- **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Regions of Delivery:** Canada, National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity Details
- **Contracting Entity Name (English):** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 
- **Contracting Entity Name (French):** Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) 
- **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity Details
- **End User Entity Name (English):** Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) 
- **End User Entity Name (French):** Ministère du Patrimoine canadien (PCH) 
- **Contact Information:** For all inquiries, please contact Chantal DesGroseilliers, qualifictions and process at chantal.desgroseilliers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Contact Information
- **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17587515
- **Contact Information
